definition: education imparted in a series of lessons or meetings, to arrange or order by classes or categories
details:
noun
- education imparted in a series of lessons or meetings
= synonyms: course of study
- elegance in dress or behavior
= example: elegance in dress or behavior
- people having the same social, economic, or educational status
= example: people having the same social, economic, or educational status
= synonyms: stratum
- a collection of things sharing a common attribute
= example: a collection of things sharing a common attribute
= synonyms: category, family
- (biology) a taxonomic group containing one or more orders
- a body of students who are taught together
= example: a body of students who are taught together
= synonyms: form
- a body of students who graduate together
= example: a body of students who graduate together
= synonyms: year
- a league ranked by quality
= example: a league ranked by quality
= synonyms: division
verb
- to arrange or order by classes or categories
= example: to arrange or order by classes or categories
= synonyms: separate, sort, sort out, classify, assort
